callout.title: Hey! We're still here!
callout.content1: We are collaborating with the Office of Academic Affairs at NTU to develop a new course website. A public beta has been released.
callout.content2: NTUCourse Neo has stopped providing service and the website will be used to document the project.
callout.content3: Thank you for your support and use of NTUCourse Neo. We look forward to seeing you soon!

vision.title: Simplify Course Planning.
vision.callout1: "National Taiwan University offers many valuable courses, but the process of planning them can be stressful."
vision.callout2: If course selection were more intuitive, students could focus more on choosing courses they are interested in.

oldInterface.title: Outdated UI
oldInterface.content: The course website interface has not been updated in decades and is difficult to navigate on both computer and mobile devices. As a result, it is difficult for students to search for and access important information.

popups.title: Annoying pop-ups
popups.content: We understand that the school needs to keep students informed about changes to courses and important notices. However, there must be a more "elegant" way to do this than using pop-up windows.

courseTable.title: Non-intuitive timetable
courseTable.content: It is important for students to know which courses they have chosen and understand the schedule for those courses. However, the current pop-up timetable is not user-friendly and does not clearly display overlapping courses.

information.title: Scattered information
information.content: Students often want access to more than just the basic information about courses, such as enrollment numbers, evaluations, and grading policies. However, this information is scattered and not easy to access all at once.

simple.title: Simple
simple.subtitle: Highlight what's truly important.
simple.content1: Neo uses collapsible lists to display course information. The most important information is kept visible, while additional details can be expanded.
simple.content2: We also designed a customizable course information display feature, allowing you to choose which information you want to see.

intuitive.title: Intuitive
intuitive.subtitle: Say goodbye to scheduling conflicts.
intuitive.content1: Interactive course schedules show time slots in real-time when hovering, making it easier to plan your schedule.
intuitive.content2: Easily adjust your priority order by dragging and dropping courses. In addition to global priority, you can also adjust the priority of courses that conflict with each other!

integration.title: Integration
integration.subtitle: Access all information you need in one place.
integration.content1: Found a course you like, but have to search for it again on Course Selection System to add it? We've built in a button that lets you add courses to the legacy system directly from Neo.
integration.content2: Our course dashboard combines official and unofficial data. From enrollment numbers, course outlines, and waitlist info, to course evaluations and past exams, we've consolidated all the information you need to select your courses.
integration.disclaimer1: Waitlist information is provided by the community and may differ from actual situation. Course evaluations and past exams are sourced from PTT NTUCourse and PTT NTUExam. Neo does not guarantee the accuracy of these data.

mobile.title: Under construction
mobile.content: Mobile Version of this site is still under construction. Browse in desktop for the best experience.

stayTuned.title: Stay Tuned.
stayTuned.content: We still have a lot of stories about Neo that we want to talk about.
